idea-plugin.name: Android Search It
idea-plugin.description:
The Android Search It plugin provides the capability to search for selected keywords in the Android codebase on popular developer search engines.

Usage:

  • Install this plugin.
  • Go to Preferences -> Keymap.
  • Search for Google. Set a shortcut for it, preferably `+G.
  • Search for Stackoverflow. Set a shortcut for it, preferably `+S.

Note:

This plugin is intended for Android developers using Android Studio. However, it will work with Intellij IDEA as well.
